Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

vCharacter = script.Parent
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")
local duration = 3.0
local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local backpack = nil
if vPlayer then backpack = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("Backpack") end
local toolInHand = nil local backpackItems = {}
if vCharacter ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myTorso ~= nil then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0
local children = vCharacter:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i] and children[i]:IsA("Tool") then toolInHand = children[i] toolInHand.Parent = nil end end
if backpack then local bChildren = backpack:GetChildren() for j = 1, #bChildren do if bChildren[j] then table.insert(backpackItems, bChildren[j]) bChildren[j].Parent = nil end end end
local ice = Instance.new("Part") ice.FormFactor = 3 ice.Shape = "Block" ice.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2) ice.CanCollide = true ice.Position = myTorso.Position ice.Transparency = 0.4 ice.Parent = vCharacter
local iceBlockMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") iceBlockMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=66876751" iceBlockMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68344795" iceBlockMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.0, 1.0, 1.0) iceBlockMesh.Parent = ice
local iceWeld = Instance.new("Weld") iceWeld.Parent = myTorso iceWeld.Part0 = myTorso iceWeld.Part1 = ice iceWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) wait(0.25) myTorso.Anchored = true while duration > 0 do myHumanoid:TakeDamage(3) duration = duration - wait(0.5) wait(0.5) end if ice then ice:Remove() end if iceWeld then iceWeld:Remove() end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 myTorso.Anchored = false if toolInHand then toolInHand.Parent = vCharacter end for a = 1, #backpackItems do if backpackItems[a] then backpackItems[a].Parent = backpack end end end
wait(4) script:Remove()

local Tool = script.Parent local Wand = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso local vPlayer
Tool.Enabled = true
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local staffDamage = 17
local flake = Instance.new("Part") flake.FormFactor = 3 flake.Shape = "Block" flake.Size = Vector3.new(0.4, 0.4, 0.4) flake.CanCollide = false flake.Transparency = 0.0
local flakeMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") flakeMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=66877034" flakeMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68344795" flakeMesh.Parent = flake flakeMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
local flakeFire = Instance.new("Fire") flakeFire.Color = Color3.new(153/255, 153/255, 1) flakeFire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(153/255, 153/255, 1) flakeFire.Parent = flake flakeFire.Size = 2.0 flakeFire.Heat = 2.0
local bg local slowCo = nil
local torsoFrame = {} local iceSound
local storm = Tool:FindFirstChild("Storm") while storm == nil do wait() storm = Tool:FindFirstChild("Storm") end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid creatorTag.Value = player debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.5) end end
function tornado() if myTorso == nil then return end
bg = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bg.P = 100000 bg.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bg.P, bg.P, bg.P) bg.Name = "BG"
torsoFrame[1] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 1*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[2] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 2*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[3] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) torsoFrame[4] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 4*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[5] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 5*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[6] = myTorso.CFrame
bg.Parent = myTorso
for i = 1, 60 do local c = i%6 + 1 if bg then bg.cframe = torsoFrame[c] end wait() end if bg then bg:Remove() end end
function wandUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function wandDown() Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1 , 0) end
function destroyEverything() local sign = 1 local missiles = {}
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
laughSound = Wand:FindFirstChild("Laugh") if laughSound then laughSound:Play() end
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 local initDirection = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector
wandDown()
local players = game.Players:GetChildren() print(#players) for i = 1, #players do if players[i] and players[i].Character then print(2) local torso = players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if torso then local distance = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 70 and players[i]:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") and players[i].PlayerGui:FindFirstChild("CamScript") == nil then print(3) local camScript = Tool.CamScript:Clone() camScript.Parent = players[i].PlayerGui camScript.Disabled = false end end end end
for i = 1, 40 do local direction local num = i%30 if num == 0 then direction = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector else direction = CFrame.Angles(0, (num-1) * sign * math.pi/20, 0) * myTorso.CFrame.lookVector end local spawnPos = (Wand.Position - Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)) + direction * 4.0 sign = sign * -1
missiles[i] = flake:Clone() missiles[i].CFrame = (CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction)) missiles[i].Velocity = direction * 70.0 missiles[i].RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, missiles[i]:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = missiles[i]
missiles[i].Parent = game.Workspace
missiles[i].Touched:connect(function(hit) pierce(missiles[i], hit, 4) end) debris:AddItem(missiles[i], 1.25) end
for i = 41, 80 do missiles[i] = flake:Clone() missiles[i].CFrame = myTorso.CFrame + Vector3.new(math.random(-1000, 1000) * 0.025, 125, math.random(-1000, 1000) * 0.025) missiles[i].Velocity = Vector3.new(math.random(), missiles[i].Velocity.Y, math.random()) missiles[i].CanCollide = true missiles[i].Parent = game.Workspace
missiles[i].Touched:connect(function(hit) pierce(missiles[i], hit, 4) end) debris:AddItem(missiles[i], 2.25) end -- wait(0.75) wandUp() if bg then bg:Remove() end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
function pierce(missile, hit, dmg) local humanoid if missile then if hit.Parent and hit then if hit.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) if dmg then humanoid:TakeDamage(dmg) else humanoid:TakeDamage(staffDamage) end if humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("TrapInIceScript") == nil then local cloneScript = Tool.TrapInIceScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent cloneScript.Disabled = false end end end end end
function shoot(direction) vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
local spawnPos = Wand.Position + direction * 4.0
local missile = flake:Clone() missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) missile.Velocity = direction * 90.0 missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:GetMass() * workspace.Gravity, 0) floatForce.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
missile.Touched:connect(function(hit) pierce(missile, hit) end)
debris:AddItem(missile, 5) end
function wandUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function wandDown() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0.848, 0.53) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, -0.53, 0.848) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - Wand.Position).unit wandDown() --shoot(direction) destroyEverything() wait(0.9) wandUp()
iceSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("IceSound") if iceSound then iceSound:Play() end
wait(9.25) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) end
function onUnequipped() if iceSound then iceSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
--storm.Changed:connect(destroyEverything)

local Tool = script.Parent local Staff = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso
local fogImageId = 68343786
local snowAssets = {68343851, 68343876, 68343890}
local sg local fogFrame local fogImage
function choiceIsYours(key) if vCharacter == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end key = key:lower() if key == "q" then print("Q") storm = Tool:FindFirstChild("Storm") if storm and storm.Value == false then print("Changed") storm.Value = true end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(choiceIsYours) end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)

local playerGui = script.Parent local player = playerGui.Parent
local character = player.Character local humanoid if character then humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then humanoid.WalkSpeed = 10.0 end end
local fogImageId = 68343786
local snowAssets = {68343851, 68343876, 68343890}
local sg = Instance.new("ScreenGui") sg.Parent = playerGui sg.Name = "Blizzard"
local fogFrame = Instance.new("Frame") fogFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 fogFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) fogFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0 ,0) fogFrame.Parent = sg
local fogImage = Instance.new("ImageLabel") fogImage.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 fogImage.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) fogImage.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) fogImage.Parent = fogFrame fogImage.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. fogImageId fogImageZIndex = 1.0
local gravImages = {}
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() while sg do for a = 1, 3 do for i = 1, math.random(8, 15) do local snow = Instance.new("ImageLabel") snow.Parent = fogFrame snow.Name = "Snow Flakes" snow.Position = UDim2.new(math.random(), 0, 0, 0) local randSize = math.random(-32, 32) snow.Size = UDim2.new(0, 32 + randSize, 0, 32 + randSize) local asset = math.random(1, #snowAssets) snow.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. snowAssets[asset] snow.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 snow.ZIndex = 3.0 table.insert(gravImages, snow) end wait(0.1) end wait(1.25) end end))
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() while true do if gravImages and #gravImages > 0 then for i = 1, #gravImages do if gravImages[i] and gravImages[i].Position.Y.Scale > 1.0 then gravImages[i]:Remove() table.remove(gravImages, i) end if gravImages[i] then sign = math.random(-1, 1) gravImages[i].Position = UDim2.new(gravImages[i].Position.X.Scale + (sign * math.random()/50), 0, gravImages[i].Position.Y.Scale + 0.0096, 0) end end end wait() end end))
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() local duration = 2.75 local camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera camera.CameraType = 1 while duration > 0 do camera.CoordinateFrame = camera.CoordinateFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.random(), math.random(), math.random()) duration = duration - wait(0.25) wait(0.25) end camera.CameraType = 5 end))
wait(5.0)
if sg then sg:Remove() end gravImages = {} if humanoid then humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
wait(3.0) script:Remove()
